definitions.meaning:
[t][i]~ (sth)扩大；扩充；扩展；增大
to make sth bigger; to become bigger

examples.content:
There are plans to enlarge the recreation area.
已经有了扩大娱乐场地的计划。

Reading will enlarge your vocabulary.
阅读能扩大词汇量。

definitions.meaning:
[t][usupass]~ sth放大（照片或文件）
to make a bigger copy of a photograph or document

examples.content:
We're going to have this picture enlarged.
我们准备将这张照片放大。
